DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect polyphenol-rich dark chocolate insulin sensitivity normal weight overweight adult .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Polyphenol-rich Dark Chocolate Insulin Sensitivity Normal Weight Overweight Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Polyphenols may several favourable effect health . Dark chocolate ( DC ) one high source polyphenols food . The aim study determine effect polyphenol-rich dark chocolate insulin sensitivity normal weight overweight adult . Seventy four volunteer history hypertension , cardiovascular disease diabetes recruit . Participants randomly receive 20g daily one two different type DC : Placebo DC ( low polyphenols ) DC rich polyphenols ( 500mg ) period four week . Participants ask make two appointment university clinical lab . Anthropometric measurement ( height , weight , waist circumference ) , blood saliva sample take 2 visit . Compliance test measure total polyphenols 24-hour urine sample random sample end intervention . To monitor fluctuation participant ' diet physical activity study period , three-day diet diary physical activity questionnaire collect start study four week . Data analyse ANCOVA time ( pre- post- ) treatment ( DC placebo ) between-subject factor .
DOC.criteria: Adults history hypertension , diabetes cardiovascular disease BMI 1824.9 BMI > 25 Males Females Age : 1865 year Participants cardiovascular disease , hypertension diabetes Smokers heavy alcohol drinker Participants take medication affect insulin , cholesterol , triglycerides blood pressure Participants take dietary supplement contain high dos antioxidant Postmenopausal woman take HRT ( Hormone Replacement Therapy ) Participants recently participate currently weight management program Participants regular consumption cocoa DC ( > 1 serving/week )
